Name: Description
Average Daily Shelter Population: The total represents the average daily number of individuals in DHS shelters over the fiscal year.

Name: Source Notes
Average Daily Shelter Population: New York City Department of Homeless Services, DHS Data Dashboard (Fiscal Years 2015 - 2020); retrieved from: https://www1.nyc.gov/site/dhs/about/stats-and-reports.page.

Name: Notes
Average Daily Shelter Population: This indicator differs from the Homeless Shelter Population, which measured the unique number of individuals served in the shelter system at any point over the fiscal year.
